abstract: DeKalb County, Ga, Police Officer Robert Olsen resigns from force; decision comes week after Olsen was indicted by grand jury on murder charges in 2015 fatal shooting of naked unarmed black man, Air Force veteran Anthony Hill, in apartment complex near Atlanta.
lead_paragraph: A white police officer facing murder and other charges in the shooting death of an unarmed, naked black man quit his post with an Atlanta-area police agency.

headline.main: Georgia: Officer Charged in Killing of Naked Man Leaves Police Force
headline.print_headline: Georgia: Officer Charged in Killing of Naked Man Leaves Police Force

snippet: A white police officer facing murder and other charges in the shooting death of an unarmed, naked black man quit his post with an Atlanta-area police agency.
